client_id.description: the client id of the keycloak app

client_secret.description: the client secret of the keycloak app

password.description: the password to authenticate against keycloak

username.description: the username to authenticate against keycloak

company_id.description: Company ID to set with the domain as metadata

contract_id.description: Contract ID to set with the domain as metadata

dns_nameserver_pair_name.description: Domain pair identifier. The default value is ns1.plusserver.com

domain_id.description: Exported ID of the domain. Same as "id"

protected.description: Protects the domain from accidental deletion. However this provider will be unable to delete the domain if set to true. The default Value is false

replication_type.description: Domain replication type. Can be either Master, Slave, Native or None

block.description: Use the plusserver DNS API to create/modify/delete a domain.

content.description: Domain record content. For example the IP address of the A record

domain_id.description: Exported ID of the domain record. Same as "id"

name.description: Domain record name without TLD or second-level domain

ttl.description: Domain record time to live in seconds. The default value is 300 seconds

type.description: Domain record type. Can be either one of "A", "AAAA", "CAA", "CNAME", "MX", "NS", "PTR", "SRV", "TXT" or "SOA".The default Value is "A".

block.description: Use the plusserver DNS API to create/modify/delete a domain record.
